subject: Basketball
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: Charley Rosen, who has known Phil Jackson for 40 years, recently published a book about the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers, who went 9-73.
snippet: Charley Rosen, who has known Phil Jackson for 40 years, recently published a book about the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers, who went 9-73.
